title: Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets      Pets are allowed in the park except in designated picnic and developed swim beach areas. Pet excrement must be immediately collected and disposed of in a trash receptacle. All pets must be kept on a leash no longer than six feet when not contained in kennel. Barking dogs are considered a nuisances and owners must remove them from the campground. Never leave your pet in a closed vehicle. Temperatures can soar to 130 degrees F in minutes. Your pet can quickly die of heat stroke in those conditions. For the exact regulations regarding pets please refer to the Code of Federal Regulations 36 CFR, section 2.15 and the Park Compendium.
